pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Field Trials with Geostatistics Spatial AR Models // Perform analysis of variance when the experimental units are spatially correlated. There are two methods to deal with spatial dependence: Spatial autoregressive models (see Rossoni, D. F., Lima, R. R. (2019) doi:10.28951/rbb.v37i2.388) and geostatistics (see Pontes, J. M., Oliveira, M. S. D. (2004) doi:10.1590/S1413-70542004000100018). For both methods, there are three multicomparison procedure available: Tukey, multivariate T, and Scott-Knott.
